column1: Little Goat Diner////The Girl & The Goat is my FAVORITE! If I ever go back to Chicago
column2: I am eating there again. As a result of going there
column3: we decided to also visit Little Goat. Since we were celebrating two birthdays
column4: we ordered lots of drinks and the Los Drowned
column6: and Garlic Mashed potatoes. The food was good
column7: but maybe since we had dinner at The Girl & The Goat the night before
column8: it just wasn't mind-blowing. I do remember the service was excellent. Our waiter was really friendly
column9: attentive (just the right amount) and brought out a shot and small dessert for our two birthday boys. If looking for a more casual atmosphere but still high quality food
column10: this is the place to go.
